scripts.refresh: pkill -9 -f node-red 2>/dev/null || true; for p in 1880 3000 11434; do fuser -k ${p}/tcp 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.node-red: npm run port-publish && node-red --userDir .node-red -D editorTheme.tours=false -D editorTheme.projects.enabled=true -D editorTheme.projects.workflow.mode='auto' -D httpRequestTimeout=600000 -D notify.message='This environment will be terminated within 10 minutes. Please download your flow immediately.' -D notify.timer=13800000
